definition: variant of 錄像|录像[lu4 xiang4]
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

sentences.english: Families gather on them to watch satellite television and DVDs.
sentences.chinese: 一家人坐在炕上看衛星電視和DVD錄相。

sentences.english: They kindly sent the screener and we loved it.
sentences.chinese: 他們友好地寄來了宣傳錄相帶，我們很喜歡。

sentences.english: Is it a live broadcast or a recorded one?
sentences.chinese: 這是現場直播還是錄相節目？

sentences.english: This videocorter can't be duty free.
The VCR was made in China.
sentences.chinese: 這種錄相機是中國製造的。

sentences.english: Perhaps they watch a movie on a video cassette recorder .
sentences.chinese: 他們共進晚餐，也許看錄相電影。

sentences.english: And third, watch a short English play on video-tape.
sentences.chinese: 第三，看一個簡短的英語錄相帶。

sentences.english: Listen to the tape then answer this question. What is Robert's job?
sentences.chinese: 看錄相，然後回答問題。羅泊特是做什麼工作的？
